DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: LABAN NETO, S. A.;LABAN NETO, SLVIO ABRAHO;LABAN NETO, SILVIO ABRAHO;LABAN NETO, SLVIO A.

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH:
Graduado em Engenharia Naval pela Poli-USP (1985); ps-graduado com Especializao em Administrao de Empresas pela EAESP-FGV (1997); doutorado em Administrao com nfase em Marketing pela EAESP-FGV (2004).
Iniciou as atividades acadmicas e de docncia em 2004 na EAESP-FGV, tendo sido tambm vice-coordenador do Centro de Excelncia em Varejo.
Atuou durante mais de 19 anos como executivo nas seguintes organizaes de servios e varejo: Accenture, Carrefour, Po de Acar e Wal Mart.
Coordenador dos programas de MBA Executivo do Insper entre 2009 e 2016. Desde Julho de 2017, coordena o Mestrado Profissional em Administrao na mesma instituio. Leciona diversas disciplinas do campo de Marketing em programas de Graduao, Ps Graduao e Educao Executiva. 
Recebeu ttulos e premiaes como Melhor Trabalho da Diviso Acadmica Marketing ? Prmio ANPAD 2008: Claro, D. P. e Laban Neto, Silvio A. ? How to build a structured network and be successful in sales: the impact of degree centrality and tie strength of sales force. Um dos 50 mais influentes profissionais de TI, Revista Info Exame (2002); entre outros.
Atuou em instituies voltadas para desenvolvimento e gesto da cadeia de abastecimento varejista, tendo sido Co presidente da Associao ECR (Efficient Consumer Response) Brasil e Amrica Latina, alm de ter integrado o Comit Executivo da Global Commerce Initiative (GCI). Participa de Conselhos de Empresas de Varejo e Servios.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN:
Graduated in Naval Engineering from Poli-USP (1985); post-graduate with Specialization in Business Administration from EAESP-FGV (1997); PhD in Administration with emphasis in Marketing from EAESP-FGV (2004).
He began his academic and teaching activities in 2004 at EAESP-FGV, where he also acted as Associate Vide Dean at the Center of Excellence in Retail.
He served for more than 19 years as an executive in the following services and retail organizations: Accenture, Carrefour, Po de Acar and Wal Mart.
Between 2009 and December, 2016 acted as Associate Dean Executive MBA Programs at Insper and since July 2017, he is the Associate Dean of Professional Masters Business Administration. In addition to these activities, teaches several fields of Marketing in undergraduate, graduate and executive education programs.
Received titles and awards as Best Work of the Academic Division Marketing - ANPAD Award 2008: Claro, DP and Laban Neto, Silvio A. - How to build a structured network and be successful in sales: the impact of degree centrality and tie strength of sales force . One of the 50 most influential IT professionals, Info Exame Magazine (2002); among others.
He has worked in institutions dedicated to the development and management of the retail supply chain. He has been co-president of the ECR (Efficient Consumer Response) Brazil and Latin America, as well as the Executive Committee of the Global Commerce Initiative (GCI). Serves on Company Boards and Associations.
